data.title: as a historian…
data.meta_description: as a historian... i am a professional historian, so in an effort to make this blog a helpful historical archive of the band, i try to tag consistently with the following system: I TAG INDIVIDUAL...
data.text:
i am a professional historian, so in an effort to make this blog a helpful historical archive of the band, i try to tag consistently with the following system:

I TAG INDIVIDUAL MEMBERS OF THE BAND IF NOT ALL OF THEM ARE IN THE PHOTO. I DO NOT TAG THE WHOLE GROUP IN ANY WAY.

I TRIGGER TAG blood, eye strain, and flashing. PLEASE LET ME KNOW IF YOU NEED ANYTHING ELSE TAGGED.

my queue tag is thank queue for the venom. i queue posts for album birthdays with the additional tag in honor of this little lady’s birthday.

full song audio is tagged as music box, with the name of the song also tagged. if the song is by a solo act instead of by mcr, the act will be tagged as well.

i tag social media posts made by the band members or people closely related to the band with [person’s first name] [social media platform] (e.g., frank instagram or gerard twitter).

NON MCR

isaac.txt, -.jpg, -.mp3, -.mp4- original posts, depending on the format of the content

answered- answered questions

not mcr- posts that are not explicitly related to mcr; most are original content

ask games- reblog/message bait; usually not related to mcr

tag games- reblog/tag bait; usually not related to mcr

BAND MEMBERS AND ERAS

frank- photos of frank, or blog posts by frank, or interviews in which frank speaks

gerard- see above

ray- see above

mikey- see above

bullets era, revenge era, black parade era, pro rev, danger days era, breakup era, return era- photos, gifs, or videos from these respective eras

pencey prep, leathermouth, death spells, cellabration, patience, future violents- photos, gifs, or videos from these respective Frank eras (pencey prep, leathermouth, and death spells also contain fanart depicting these eras; bloodnun is almost exclusively fanart or audio content; skeleton crew is almost exclusively merch or blog posts)

hesitant alien- photos, gifs, videos, or fanart of this Gerard era

pre mcr- photos of the band members before the mcr was formed (pencey prep/i am a graveyard is NOT tagged with pre mcr)

FANART

fanart- generic fanart tag; most posts will contain an additional tag to further elaborate

bullets, three cheers, tbp, dd- fanart (including lyric edits) depicting these respective eras

fiatc, fiatp, fiatfv- fanart (including lyric edits) depicting these respective eras (see above for fanart of pencey prep, leathermouth, death spells, bloodnun, or skeleton crew)

parallels- posts containing parallels of lyrics, images, themes, etc. (will not be cross-posted with ‘fanart’)

my art- original fanart

ASSOCIATED ACTS

these are individuals or other bands which appear frequently with my chemical romance; not every band/person i will tag is included in this list

cortez- photos, gifs, or videos of Matt Cortez

worm- photos, gifs, or videos of Big Worm

brian- photos, gifs, or videos of Brian Schechter

evan- photos, gifs, or videos of Evan Nestor

kayleigh- photos, gifs, or videos of Kayleigh Goldsworthy

jamia- photos, gifs, or videos of Jamia Iero

kristen- photos, gifs, or videos of Kristen Way

alicia- photos, gifs, or videos of Alicia Simmons

donna- photos, gifs, or videos of Donna Way

grant- photos, gifs, or videos of Grant Morrison

paul harries- original photographs by paul harries

justin borucki- original photographs by justin borucki

sweet pea, lois, millie, peppers- photos, gifs, or videos of any of these dogs

thursday- photos, gifs, or videos which include thursday (or members of thursday) with mcr or mcr members (i also tag geoff and tucker individually; tucker may also be tagged in posts about the Future Violents)

taking back sunday- photos, gifs, or videos which include tbs (or members of tbs) with mcr or mcr members (i also tag adam individually)

the used- photos, gifs, or videos which include the used (or member of the used) with mcr or mcr members (i also tag bert and jepha individually)

CLOTHING/APPEARANCE

youth large in his 20s- entirely frank-centric, pictures of him in the banner jersey wolf hoodie

pansy- photos of franks iconic les paul guitar used during three cheers for sweet revenge

bulletproof vest- photos of frank and/or gerard during revenge era in which they are wearing a bulletproof vest (or the singular black parade show)

priest collar- photos of gerard during revenge era in which he is wearing a priest collar

blond hawk- photos of frank during revenge era in which the sides of his head are blond

red hawk- see above, except red instead of blond

half blond- photos of gerard during revenge era in which the back half of his head is blond

half red- see above, except red instead of blond

teal roots- photos of gerard in revenge era in which the roots of his hair are teal

bat belt- photos of bullets and revenge era gerard in which he is wearing the bat belt buckle

velvet blazer- photos of revenge era gerard wearing the velvet blazer and/or suit

anthrax shirt- photos of mikey in the famous anthrax shirt

skeleton gloves- mostly revenge era frank-centric in which he is wearing the skeleton gloves (primarily in their fingerless iteration)

revenge bracelet- photos of revenge era gerard wearing the REVENGE bracelet

red blazer- photos of revenge era gerard in the red blazer

tattoo- typically fan tattoos relating to mcr, rather than tattoos on the band members themselves

RESOURCES, HISTORY & MERCH

my posts containing links to different mcr fonts, including album fonts, can be found here.
